articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, CNN
articles.title: Americans who stay in China should 'consider stocking up on food,' State Department says
articles.description: The State Department is recommending US citizens who remain in China take precautionary measures, including "stocking up on food," in the face of the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak that has spread worldwide.
articles.content:
Washington (CNN)The State Department is recommending US citizens who remain in China take precautionary measures, including "stocking up on food," in the face of the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak that has spread worldwide.

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: The coronavirus is clobbering oil prices
articles.description: Crude oil has crashed into yet another bear market on fears that the coronavirus outbreak will destroy demand in China, the world's largest crude importer.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Gilead Sciences testing antiviral drug to treat coronavirus
articles.description: There is no cure for the deadly Wuhan coronavirus, but several big biotech companies are hoping they can treat the symptoms with existing antiviral medications.

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: Dow jumps 300 points, rebounding from coronavirus selloff
articles.description: The Dow and the broader US stock market are rallying Monday, as stocks rebound from last week's sharp selloff over the potential fallout from the global coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: China accuses US of overreacting to virus outbreak
articles.description: The coronavirus outbreak has killed at least 362 people and infected more than 17,300 globally, as it continues to spread beyond China. One person outside mainland China, a man in the Philippines, has died. CNN's David Culver reports from Beijing, China.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.author: AJ Willingham, CNN
articles.title: 5 things to know for February 3: Impeachment, Iowa, coronavirus, Syria, travel ban
articles.description: Here's what else you need to know to Get Up to Speed and Out the Door.
articles.content:
Get '5 things' in your inbox
If your day doesn't start until you've gotten up to speed on the latest headlines, then let us introduce you to your new favorite morning fix. Sign up here for the '5 Things' newsletter.

articles.author: Sherisse Pham and Serenitie Wang, CNN Business
articles.title: First major Chinese airliner suspends flights to the United States over coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: China Eastern has become the first major Chinese carrier to suspend flights to and from the United States amid the escalating Wuhan coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: By Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: US enforces coronavirus travel restrictions. China says it's an overreaction
articles.description: The US has begun implementing new rules around travel from China as the coronavirus death toll creeps higher -- rules that include re-routing Americans flying into the country to specific airports for screening.
articles.content:
Christina Maxouris, CNNPublished 3rd February 2020

articles.title: Exclusive: Inside an isolation ward
articles.description: Macao, known as China's gambling haven, has become a ghost town since the coronavirus outbreak. CNN's Ivan Watson went to their emergency room where suspected patients are being brought in.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.author: Analysis by Joshua Berlinger, CNN Business
articles.title: Six months of protests wrecked Hong Kong's economy. A virus scare is the last thing this city needs
articles.description: Months of increasingly violent protests and a bruising US-China trade war pushed Hong Kong into a recession last year for the first time in a decade. Now the coronavirus outbreak threatens to derail things once again.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris
articles.title: There are now 11 confirmed cases of the coronavirus in the US
articles.description: Health officials Sunday announced three more cases of the coronavirus in California, bringing the state's total to six and the country's total to 11 cases.

articles.author: James Griffiths, CNN
articles.title: Much of China's economic heartland closed down
articles.description: The number of Wuhan coronavirus deaths in mainland China has overtaken the 2003 severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) epidemic in the country, as Beijing injected billions of dollars into an economy hit by weeks of effective shutdowns to major cities.

articles.title: Number of deaths from current coronavirus outbreak overtakes SARS in China
articles.content:
Doctors in Thailand say they have successfully treated two Wuhan coronavirus patients with a combination of antiviral drugs, according to a briefing on Sunday from the Ministry of Health.

articles.author: Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: Chinese markets plunge as investors react to outbreak
articles.description: Chinese stocks plunged Monday on the first day investors could react to the coronavirus outbreak in more than a week.
